programme.desc: After a close call with the law, Tony heads to the lake house with Carmela to celebrate his birthday. Once there, Bobby presents him with an automatic machine gun, and the pair enjoy some target practice in the woods, but tensions rise when Janice begins telling embarrassing family stories, culminating in a tussle between the men. Back at the house, AJ skips work to host a pool party. Drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Johnny Sack is given three months to live after being diagnosed with cancer, and a marked decline in his health leaves Ginny and Allegra devastated. Meanwhile, Tony finds art imitating life at the premiere of Cleaver, and later vents his frustration about Chris in a therapy session. Silvio has a narrow escape when a hitman targets Gerry Torciano

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony leaves town with Paulie after hearing the FBI is digging at the site where he buried an enemy. The pair reminisce about old times as they drive, but Tony becomes increasingly frustrated by his associates overly detailed anecdotes. Meanwhile, Juniors doctors increase his medication after he brawls with Professor Lynch. Starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony is bitten by the gambling bug and urges Carmela to stake her property profits on the Jets. AJ proposes to Blanca, promising he will rise from pizzeria night manager to restaurant chain owner, and Marie asks for help when she reaches the end of her tether with the rebellious Vito Jr. Meanwhile, Hesh makes a devastating discovery. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini and Edie Falco

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: AJ is inconsolable after his split from Blanca and is prescribed antidepressants by his therapist, but Tony offers his own brand of medicine by sending his son to a strip club. Christopher is furious to discover his father-in-law and Paulie have been dealing in tools for the hardware store through other suppliers, but finds his drinking problem is to blame. Gritty drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: An elite squad of Navy SEALs, on a covert mission to transport a prisoner off a CIA black site island prison, are trapped when insurgents attack while trying to rescue the same prisoner. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Ashley Greene and Ryan Phillippe

programme.title: Blood For Dust
programme.desc: A travelling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague. Action thriller, starring Scoot McNairy, Kit Harington, Josh Lucas and Ethan Suplee

programme.title: One More Shot
programme.desc: A Navy SEAL squad leader escorts a suspected terrorist from a black site when they come under fire from a group of mercenaries. Director James Nunns thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Alexis Knapp and Tom Berenger

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of meta-humans to stand against supervillain Steppenwolf, but despite the help of Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash, it may already be too late to save the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot and Henry Cavill

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Retired soldier Benjamin Martin, who turned his back on the military to become a farmer in South Carolina, takes up arms once more to avenge the unprovoked murder of his son at the hands of the British during the American War of Independence. As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerichs action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless mercenary Deckard Shaw have spent years trying to take each other down. But the mismatched heroes must put their differences aside and team up when a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist gains control of an insidious bio-threat that could alter humanity forever. Action adventure spin-off, starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba and Helen Mirren

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: American soldiers are sent into war-torn Mogadishu in 1993 on a routine search and capture operation. Learning some of their compatriots have been shot down, they feel compelled to mount a perilous rescue attempt - one that descends into all-out conflict with heavily armed Somalians. Ridley Scotts fact-based drama, starring Josh Hartnett, Eric Bana, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore and Orlando Bloom

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers, he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Irons, Minnie Driver and Jemma Redgrave

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless mercenary Deckard Shaw have spent years trying to take each other down. But the mismatched heroes must put their differences aside and team up when a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist gains control of an insidious bio-threat that could alter humanity forever. Action adventure spin-off, starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba and Helen Mirren

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his fathers death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton

programme.title: Wrath of the Titans
programme.desc: The Greek god Zeus is betrayed by his fellow immortals, who intend to release the monstrous race of titans they banished to the underworld. His Demi-God son Perseus must rescue his father and protect the human race from the terrifying creatures that have been unleashed on the world. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: During the 14th century, William Tell defends his family and his homeland of Switzerland after the Austrian King invades. Historical drama, starring Claes Bang, Connor Swindells, Ben Kingsley and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Pils Adventures
programme.desc: Pil, a young orphan living on the streets of Roc-en-Brume with her three tame weasels, disguises herself and embarks on a quest to save the heir to the throne and victim of an enchantment. Animated adventure, with the voice of Eleanor Noble

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: The grumpy ogre longs for his simple life as a feared monster, so strikes a deal with magical trickster Rumpelstiltskin to get back to the way things were. However, he soon finds there is a catch - he ends up stuck in an alternate world where none of his friends know who he is and where Rumpelstiltskin has become the kingdoms tyrannical ruler. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato, Julia Roberts, Rainn Wilson and Joe Manganiello

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red joins forces with Leonards team as the flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their war to the next level. When a new threat emerges that puts both Bird and Pig Island in danger, Red, Chuck, Bomb and Mighty Eagle recruit Chucks sister Silver and team up with pigs Leonard, his assistant Courtney and techpig Garry to forge an unsteady truce and form an unlikely superteam to save their homes. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Peter Dinklage, Tiffany Haddish and Dove Cameron

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren steals the Book of Legends to locate the Trident of Atlantis so she can reign supreme over the ocean. Animation with the voice of Yvette Nicole Brown

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight and his allies pursue four supervillains who have joined forces to cause havoc on Halloween. They discover the gang is working for the Joker, who has a grander scheme in mind - unleashing a computer virus that will make every piece of technology in Gotham City obey his commands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Troy Baker

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of childrens books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase, and for centuries the noblemans ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American father Hiram B Otis moves into the country pile with his family, and daughter Virginia forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to the States. Animated adventure with the voices of Stephen Fry and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
programme.desc: An Irish boy named Keegan and a Spanish girl named Moya journey into the mythical world of the legendary Megaloceros Giganteus, who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life. Family animation, with the voices of Sam Hardy, Hannah Herman Cortes, Pierce Brosnan and Brendan Gleeson

The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Inventor Wallace and his canine sidekick Gromit have set up a pest-control service, and are called in to stop rabbits overrunning a garden show. However, the pair are overwhelmed when a destructive giant bunny arrives on the scene, while an interfering aristocrat contrives to make matters worse. Nick Parks Oscar-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Peter Sallis, Ralph Fiennes and Helena Bonham Carter

programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell

programme.desc: A streetwise cat has the perfect money-making scam after finding a pipe-playing kid who has a horde of strangely literate rats. Animated adventure based on the Terry Pratchett story, featuring the voices of Hugh Laurie, Emilia Clarke and David Thewlis

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: A hero is needed to defend a peaceful valley community from attack by a rampaging snow leopard. The unlikely candidate for the job is a lazy panda, who enlists the aid of a legendary team of animal fighters and their wise master to teach him the martial arts skills he needs to fulfil his destiny. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane and Jackie Chan

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash traps The Flash in a time loop so he is forced to relive the same day

programme.title: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
programme.desc: An Irish boy named Keegan and a Spanish girl named Moya journey into the mythical world of the legendary Megaloceros Giganteus, who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life. Family animation, with the voices of Sam Hardy, Hannah Herman Cortes, Pierce Brosnan and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks anniversary celebrations are thwarted by an evil sorcerer searching for a magical orb hidden deep inside their castle. When Derek is lured out of the palace to rescue his kidnapped mother, Odette calls on her band of animal friends for help. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson and Christy Landers

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A primary school teacher enters his class in a Song for Christmas competition, and ends up having to lead the busload of excitable kids - as well as his irresponsible teaching assistant - on a disastrous trip to Wales for the event. The journey also leads to an unwanted confrontation with his high-flying twin brother. Comedy sequel, starring David Tennant, Marc Wootton, Joanna Page and Jessica Hynes

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude, Wheres My Donkey?!
programme.desc: The pupils of St Bernadettes face a new challenge as Christmas approaches, when their new teacher loses his memory, forgetting everything about the festive season and that he is about to get married. It falls to the kids, led by excitable teacher Mr Poppy, to help him remember both in time for the wedding. Comedy sequel, starring Martin Clunes, Catherine Tate, Marc Wootton and Celia Imrie

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary boy, with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side, sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father, who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm. Festive family adventure, starring Henry Lawfull, Toby Jones, Sally Hawkins and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her recently widowed grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home. Festive family drama, starring James Cromwell and Darcey Ewart

programme.title: Nantucket Noel
programme.desc: A woman learns of a developers plans to tear down the wharf that is home to her toy store, and tensions rise as she falls for the developers son. Starring Sarah Power

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: A married couple from Chicago decide to steer clear of the usual festive celebrations and keep their cash for a holiday in the sun, prompting a busybody neighbour to call on the local community to pull out all the stops to make them change their minds. Festive comedy based on a novel by John Grisham, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Tim Allen, Dan Aykroyd and M Emmet Walsh

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: In the magical town of Whoville, a race of human-like creatures called Whos are thrilled about celebrating Christmas. However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A teenager is given a strange, cute creature as a Christmas present by his eccentric father and warned to keep it away from water, not to feed it after midnight, or expose it to direct light. However, a chance dousing causes the furball to spawn a horde of murderous little monsters, and their devilish antics bring mayhem to a small town. Comedy horror, with Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton and Polly Holliday

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Convict Rudy learns his cellmate has a girlfriend on the outside who he has only ever communicated with by letter. When the romantic inmate is killed in a riot and Rudy is paroled, he decides to track this woman down and assume the dead mans identity. However, his deception draws him into a casino robbery being orchestrated by her crazed brother. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron and Gary Sinise

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: A boy is left disillusioned with Christmas as his dysfunctional family spend the holiday arguing. They must soon learn to work together if they are to see New Year, when a monstrous demon appears, intent on punishing them for their lack of festive spirit - and which has the power to make the houses Christmas decorations take on murderous life. Comedy horror, starring Toni Collette and Emjay Anthony

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: While heading home, Hawthorne College student Lindsey is impaled with an icicle by a masked individual. Its the beginning of a bloodthirsty rampage, prompting Riley Stone and her friends to fight back. Co-writer/director Sophia Takals horror remake, starring Imogen Poots, Lily Donoghue, Aleyse Shannon and Brittany OGrady

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: An American family fulfil their dream of moving back to Norway after inheriting a cabin in the mountains, but soon encounter dark forces. Festive comedy horror, starring Martin Starr, Amrita Acharia and Kiran Shah

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary boy, with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side, sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father, who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm. Festive family adventure, starring Henry Lawfull, Toby Jones, Sally Hawkins and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: A married couple from Chicago decide to steer clear of the usual festive celebrations and keep their cash for a holiday in the sun, prompting a busybody neighbour to call on the local community to pull out all the stops to make them change their minds. Festive comedy based on a novel by John Grisham, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Tim Allen, Dan Aykroyd and M Emmet Walsh

Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: In the magical town of Whoville, a race of human-like creatures called Whos are thrilled about celebrating Christmas. However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: An American householder is dismayed when his plans for a traditional festive family holiday are thrown into complete disarray by a succession of annoying neighbours and long-lost relatives, who turn up on his doorstep offering their own brand of Christmas cheer. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly DAngelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: In the magical town of Whoville, a race of human-like creatures called Whos are thrilled about celebrating Christmas. However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: A couple have always managed to avoid family festivities by travelling overseas. However, when their flight is cancelled, each of their divorced parents insists they spend yuletide with them - forcing the pair to get through a quartet of Christmas celebrations on the same day. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: The Christmas Movie Countdown
programme.desc: The nations favourite festive film is revealed as Simon Callow presents a countdown of the top 25 as voted for by the public

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: An orphaned girl befriends a benevolent giant, who takes her off to a magical land, where they attempt to stop the man-eating creatures that are invading the human world. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Roald Dahls book, starring Mark Rylance, Ruby Barnhill and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: British wizard Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York City with a bagful of magical creatures as part of a global study of fantastic beasts, but gets caught up in a conflict when some of the creatures in his care are accidentally released after an inadvertent switching of suitcases with a baker. With a strange, dark force terrorising the Big Apple, Newt needs to find some allies to help him round up the beasts, while saving his own skin in the meantime. Harry Potter prequel written for the screen by JK Rowling, starring Eddie Redmayne, with Katherine Waterston, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton, Jon Voight, Dan Fogler and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Pregnant Mollie is dumped by her boyfriend, and sets out after the babys birth to find a surrogate father for her infant son Mikey, who comments on proceedings through a wisecracking inner monologue. Mikey is confident the cab driver who helped deliver him is the perfect man for the job - but his mother is less than convinced. Comedy, with John Travolta, Kirstie Alley and the voice of Bruce Willis

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Green-skinned Elphaba Thropp becomes part of the new intake at Shiz University, and shares a room with fellow spell-caster Galinda Upland. Its the beginning of a friendship which culminates in an epic showdown as Elphaba transforms a renegade witch with a skill for bursting into show-stopping songs, like Defying Gravity. Part one of The Wizard of Oz prequel based on the hit stage musical, starring Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande-Butera, Jonathan Bailey, Michelle Yeoh and Jeff Goldblum

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: In 1927, the Magical Congress of the United States of America transfers the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald to Europe to stand trial, but he escapes. In an attempt to scupper the evil sorcerers plans of raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander to help. Second part of JK Rowlings Harry Potter prequel saga, starring Eddie Redmayne, Johnny Depp, Katherine Waterston and Jude Law

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
programme.desc: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family. Adventure sequel, starring Rose Byrne and Domhnall Gleeson, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Two bored youngsters are led on a series of zany misadventures when a manic moggy comes knocking at their door with a magical stovepipe hat on his head and mischief in mind. Comedy fantasy based on the childrens book by Dr Seuss, starring Mike Myers, Alec Baldwin, Dakota Fanning and Spencer Breslin

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Pregnant Mollie is dumped by her boyfriend, and sets out after the babys birth to find a surrogate father for her infant son Mikey, who comments on proceedings through a wisecracking inner monologue. Mikey is confident the cab driver who helped deliver him is the perfect man for the job - but his mother is less than convinced. Comedy, with John Travolta, Kirstie Alley and the voice of Bruce Willis

Second part of JK Rowlings Harry Potter prequel saga, starring Eddie Redmayne, Johnny Depp, Katherine Waterston and Jude Law

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Too
programme.desc: Wisecracking toddler Mikey is joined by mischievous baby sister Julie and sibling rivalry inevitably erupts - while their parents have problems of their own to deal with, in the shape of the kids good-for-nothing uncle. Comedy sequel, starring John Travolta and Kirstie Alley, with the voices of Bruce Willis and Rosanne Barr

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Youngster Dorothy Gale is whisked over the rainbow by a tornado into the magical land of Oz, where she inadvertently kills a wicked witch - incurring the wrath of another. Setting out to find the wizard who can show her a way home, she is joined on her journey by a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who all hope their own wishes will be granted. Musical fantasy, with Judy Garland, Ray Bolger, Jack Haley, Bert Lahr and Frank Morgan

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: The blue hedgehog, Knuckles and Tails reunite to face the might of the villainous Shadow, who possesses powers unlike anything they have seen before. Outmuscled on every front, Sonic seeks help from an unlikely source, Dr Ivo Robotnik. Fantasy adventure sequel based on the videogame, starring Jim Carrey, James Marsden and Tika Sumpter

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: In a fantasy world where a fairy godmother endows each newborn with a special attribute, baby Ella is given the unwelcome gift of obedience. While growing up, she is magically compelled to do anything she is told to, and her stepmother takes great delight in forcing the girl to obey her every whim. So Ella sets out on a quest to find her fairy godmother and get her to take back her unwanted birthright. Fantasy adventure, starring Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Minnie Driver and Joanna Lumley

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Youngster Dorothy Gale is whisked over the rainbow by a tornado into the magical land of Oz, where she inadvertently kills a wicked witch - incurring the wrath of another. Setting out to find the wizard who can show her a way home, she is joined on her journey by a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who all hope their own wishes will be granted. Musical fantasy, with Judy Garland, Ray Bolger, Jack Haley, Bert Lahr and Frank Morgan

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A storm-chaser and her estranged husband are brought together in a joint project to monitor the path of an oncoming tornado - but the pair face a race against the clock as a rival government-backed group with hi-tech resources tries to beat them to it. Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppolas gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: The Godfather Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michaels story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppolas Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale and Lee Strasberg

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his familys Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Francis Ford Coppolas crime drama sequel, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach and Bridget Fonda

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside towns tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chiefs efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielbergs thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. But Wayne also has to stop his girlfriend leaving him for her slimy manager. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Ralph Brown, Kim Basinger, Tia Carrere and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin OBrien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: Burning an Illusion
programme.desc: A black woman living in West London hopes to marry her boyfriend, but finds her life thrown into upheaval when he loses his job and is subsequently arrested after getting into a fight. The experience makes her reassess her priorities, and she decides to reconnect with her African heritage. Drama, starring Cassie McFarlane and Victor Romero Evans

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Youngster Dorothy Gale is whisked over the rainbow by a tornado into the magical land of Oz, where she inadvertently kills a wicked witch - incurring the wrath of another. Setting out to find the wizard who can show her a way home, she is joined on her journey by a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who all hope their own wishes will be granted. Musical fantasy, with Judy Garland, Ray Bolger, Jack Haley, Bert Lahr and Frank Morgan

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientists formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: A truck driver accepts a challenge to deliver a consignment of beer to a party. He claims he can make the 900-mile round trip in just 28 hours, but a pompous sheriff is determined to stop him in his tracks, not least because his prospective daughter-in-law has deserted his son and hitched a ride with the unlikely hero. Comedy, starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Sally Field and Jerry Reed

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside towns tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chiefs efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielbergs thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Oppressed Mexican villagers cross the border into America looking to buy guns to defend their homes and crops from bandits. Instead they encounter an enigmatic loner who persuades them to hire a band of gunslingers to teach the villagers how to fight before the marauders return. Western, with Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Robert Vaughn, James Coburn and Eli Wallach

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each others lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: A banker is wrongly jailed for his wifes murder and over the course of a life sentence he forms a close friendship with a fellow inmate. He also earns a position of trust as book-keeper to the corrupt prison governor - but makes an enemy of his benefactor as he tries to clear his name. Frank Darabonts drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A married lawyer has a one-night stand with a business associate while his wife and children are out of town. He hopes to keep his infidelity a secret, but she is determined to continue the relationship, and begins obsessively stalking him and his unsuspecting family. Thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Glenn Close and Anne Archer

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientists formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Until Dawn

The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Inside a rural farmhouse, painter Ramona Harris recuperates with a leg brace following a head-on car collision that claimed the life of her husband. Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientists ill-advised experiments with virtual reality equipment transform a mentally handicapped gardener into a computer-enhanced megalomaniac with the power to make his dreams of world domination come true. Sci-fi thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Geoffrey Lewis and Austin OBrien

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: A 19th-century widow must make an unimaginable choice when, during a cruel winter, a foreign ship sinks off the coast of her fishing village. Horror mystery, starring Odessa Young, Joe Cole, Siobhan Finneran and Rory McCann

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A man buys his pregnant wife a vintage doll, which places their lives in jeopardy. Members of a Satanic cult have their eyes on the antique toy, and break into their house to prepare a ritual that will transform the harmless plaything into a terrifying monster. Horror spin-off from The Conjuring, starring Annabelle Wallis and Ward Horton

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. The Daltons vacation soon turns into a nightmare when they are invited to stay on the Felds country estate. Horror, starring James McAvoy, Mackenzie Davis, Scoot McNairy and Aisling Franciosi

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Residents of a small Pennsylvania town are disturbed when a UFO crashes into a back garden. Director Marc Turtletaubs comedy drama, starring Ben Kingsley, Harriet Harris and Jane Curtin

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A man buys his pregnant wife a vintage doll, which places their lives in jeopardy. Members of a Satanic cult have their eyes on the antique toy, and break into their house to prepare a ritual that will transform the harmless plaything into a terrifying monster. Horror spin-off from The Conjuring, starring Annabelle Wallis and Ward Horton

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: In the Stone Age, a gang of early humans face a mystical being hellbent on hunting them down. Prehistoric horror, starring Iola Evans and Arno Luning. The dialogue is in a specially contructed language and features subtitles

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A spaceship crash leaves a renowned war hero and his 13-year-old son stranded on Earth, which was abandoned by the human race centuries ago. Since mankinds departure, the planet has become home to all manner of dangerous life-forms, and the boy must make a desperate journey across hostile terrain to secure a rescue for his injured father. Sci-fi adventure, starring Will and Jaden Smith, with Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Strange Darling
programme.desc: A twisted one-night stand devolves into a serial killers vicious killing spree and a cat-and-mouse chase. Writer/director JT Mollners thriller, starring Willa Fitzgerald, Kyle Gallner, Madisen Beaty and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: An ex-prosecutor investigates when a man falsely pleads guilty to drug trafficking after being framed, uncovering a corrupt lawyers scheme and fighting to restore justice - despite obstruction from evil forces. Action thriller, starring Donnie Yen, Julian Cheung and Francis Ng. In Cantonese

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Baker Dill lives a peaceful life as a fishing boat captain, leading tours off a tranquil cove. His peace is shattered when estranged ex-wife Karen reappears, begging for him to help save her and their son from her violent husband. Thriller, written and directed by Peaky Blinders creator Steven Knight, starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway and Diane Lane

programme.title: Antebellum
programme.desc: Successful author Veronica Henley finds herself trapped in a horrifying reality that forces her to confront the past, present and future - before it is too late. Horror mystery from first-time directors Gerard Bush and Christopher Renz, starring Janelle Monae, Eric Lange, Jena Malone and Jack Huston

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the Mob. However, the Treasury Department start closing in on him, so he decides to take on a legitimate client in the form of a robotics company. As he works through their books, he uncovers a discrepancy involving millions of dollars. Action-packed thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: An assassination attempt is made on the life of the US president during a terrorism summit. The story unfolds from several perspectives, including that of the secret service agents charged with protecting the head of state, a news producer covering the event and a man in the crowd who may have caught the perpetrator on camera. Thriller, starring Dennis Quaid, Matthew Fox, Forest Whitaker, Sigourney Weaver and William Hurt

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: The skipper of a fishing boat and his crew ignore severe weather warnings and head for a dangerous area of the North Atlantic in search of the last lucrative catch of the season, but end up fighting for survival in the worst storm of the 20th century. Fact-based disaster drama, with George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane, John C Reilly and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When a spy is suspected of treason, her husband faces the ultimate test - loyalty to his marriage or his country. Director Steven Soderberghs thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Cate Blanchett and Rege-Jean Page

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A cynical petty crook is inspired when he sees a freelance camera crew, and decides to go into business filming crime scenes and accidents, then selling the footage to news broadcasters. His determination to stay ahead of the competition leads him down a dark path as his methods become increasingly ruthless. Crime drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo and Bill Paxton

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctors deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avengers trap. Ridley Scotts thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders investigates the bizarre murders of two women with the same name and unravels a web of small-town lies. He soon falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour who is eager to help solve the mystery. Director John Slatterys comedy thriller, starring Jon Hamm, Nick Mohammed and Tina Fey

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patients fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalans thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangsters accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his bosss millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchies crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince a bare-knuckle champion to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchies comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Four teenagers are sentenced to reform school after a prank results in the accidental death of an old man, and suffer sexual abuse at the hands of the guards. Years later, when the boys have grown up and begun to follow very different professions, a chance encounter with one of their abusers inspires them to plot revenge. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Robert De Niro, Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Bacon, Jason Patric and Minnie Driver

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: A shy clerk marries a hooker and kills her pimp, and together they go on the run to Los Angeles with $5million of cocaine they plan to sell. However, the drugs belong to the Mob and hitmen are soon on their trail. Tony Scotts thriller, written by Quentin Tarantino and starring Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper, Gary Oldman, Val Kilmer, Brad Pitt and Christopher Walken

programme.desc: An idealistic young New York City public defender - burned out by the system, on the brink of disbarment, and seeing signs of the universe collapsing all around him - decides to rob a multi-million-dollar drug deal of one of his clients. Crime comedy drama, starring John Boyega, Olivia Cooke, Bill Skarsgard and Ed Skrein

programme.title: UFO Hunters

The remains have revealed secrets about life during the Black Death, including signs of backbreaking agricultural work, poor nutrition and battles

programme.title: Combat Ships

programme.title: Ramses the Great: King of Ancient Egypt
programme.desc: Ramses ruled Egypt for at least 29 years, although some Egyptologists think he could have ruled for as long as 30. Either way, it was one of the longest reigns in pharaonic history

programme.title: Ramses the Great: King of Ancient Egypt
programme.desc: Merenptah, the 13th son of Ramses II, the great pharaoh of Ancient Egypt. Merenptah became pharaoh after his fathers long reign, when all of his older brothers had died. His reign was marked by feuds between rival branches of the family, and the throne was close to bankruptcy

programme.title: The Egyptian Book of the Dead
programme.desc: A version of the ancient text once buried with an Egyptian scribe called Ani to guide him in the afterlife. The book, now preserved in the British Museum, is the first written account of any religion, a likely source of the Ten Commandments and thought to be the oldest surviving document in human history

programme.title: Iconic Combat Machines

programme.title: A Ship Through Time
programme.sub-title: A Ship Through Time: Secrets of the Newport Ship
programme.desc: Part one of two. Sean Fletcher investigates the secrets of a shipwrecked 15th-century trading galleon found by accident off Newport in south Wales in 2002, her international significance and how two of Europes most turbulent and violent wars shaped her fate. He discovers what this trading galleon carried, and to where and a possible powerful owner. He also sheds light on a possible connection to the Wars of the Roses

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: A secret military base discovered a few hundred miles from the North Pole. A man-made, ancient stone formation is found 120ft below the surface of Lake Huron. Plus, in Russias far east, a life-form that scientists think can live for thousands of years is discovered in the permafrost

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: The broadcaster concludes his exploration of the archipelago with a look at how, despite their proximity, no two of the 19 islands are the same. He also uncovers evidence that evolution on Galapagos is occurring faster than Charles Darwin could ever have imagined, and encounters Lonesome George, the last remaining giant Pinta Island tortoise, who died just a few weeks after filming in June 2012

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals
programme.sub-title: From the Seas to the Skies
programme.desc: Part one of two. The naturalist explores the evolution of vertebrates over the past 500 million years, beginning with a look at how remarkable advances allowed primitive fish to make the radical move on to land, and then take to the skies with the advent of flight. He uses fossils of both ancient and living species combined with CGI and film to chart their journey out of the water to populate all corners of the globe

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals
programme.desc: The naturalist concludes his two-part exploration of the evolution of vertebrates over the past 500 million years by looking at the history of mammals. He traces their journey from humble origins as tiny nocturnal forest-dwellers to their astonishing explosion in diversity and domination of the world following the death of the dinosaurs

programme.title: Fuascail
programme.desc: A creative contemplation by visual artist, musician and composer Barry Kerr, known as Fuascail. Kerr uses a combination of his musical compositions and visual artistry to portray an abstract reflection on the revolutionary period of Irelands history. Fuascail could by translated as release, redeem or resolve and Kerr uses these three pillars to tease out his own feelings around history, conflict and commemoration. The film is set in Connemara where Kerr spent much time drawing inspiration from the landscape and its history, composing new music and painting new work

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: The Shipmans travel to Wales to spend Christmas with the Wests, but for Gavin and Stacey, parenthood continues to present them with several challenges, their baby now being 10. Smithy also continues to commit to his fatherly role, making the journey to Barry at weekends and every second Wednesday to see 12-year-old Neil the Baby. Nessa has adopted her own style of mothering, while Pam, Mick and Gwen have become the epitome of doting grandparents. On Christmas Eve, Dawn makes a shocking discovery about Pete that jeopardises their marriage - again - while a visit to the pub becomes an eye-opener in more ways than one. Festive edition from 2019. starring Mathew Horne, Joanna Page, James Corden and Ruth Jones

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Christmas special from 2003. As Rodney and Cassandra prepare for the arrival of their own little plonker, the Trotter brothers must raise the money they need to pay back the Inland Revenue or risk losing their cherished flat in Nelson Mandela House - but an old photo soon takes the plot into much darker territory. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Tessa Peake-Jones, Gwyneth Strong and John Challis star in the last-ever episode

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters go on a lads day out to Margate with their mates, but things do not go as expected when their bus blows up, leaving them stranded overnight in the seaside town. Finding a room in the hotel from hell, the brothers are only too happy to go out and sample the local nightlife - and thats when Del-Boy gets a blast from the past. Feature-length Christmas special from 1989, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del buys a new manual to help him show Raquel more appreciation and give him the confidence to make positive decisions. Unfortunately, as a result of such upbeat thinking, the Trotters cash flow hits an all-time low and an angry punter is left baying for blood. The second part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy, starring David Jason, Tessa Peake-Jones and Nicholas Lyndhurst

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: An active family loves having room for sports in their backyard, but the low ceilings and an awkward layout inside keep the home from being perfect

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles is in Spalding, Lincolnshire, to meet Dakota Read and her family. The eight-year-old was born with quadriplegic cerebral palsy and her home needs to be made more wheelchair-friendly. Enter the DIY SOS builders, who set to work on designer Gabrielle Blackmans vision, although with just nine days to complete the task, theyll need help. Luckily, the local tradespeople are also out in force, giving their time and their skills for free

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Ever since suffering a brain infection four years ago, Sunderland woman June Findlay has been unable to walk or talk and is totally dependent on her devoted husband John. Since then she has been sleeping on a hospital bed in the kitchen, with no washing or toilet facilities. Joan and John do their best, but Nick Knowles believes they deserve better, so he and his small band of builders - bolstered by an army of local tradespeople - set out to extend the Findlays home, with designer Oliver Heath on hand to protect his vision. Can they give June back her dignity?

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning its 10,000 pound jackpot

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team come to the aid of Manchester couple Rebecca and Steve, whose life was changed for ever when they found out they were expecting triplets. Two years on, Rebecca is becoming depressed by the state of their small, damp, dilapidated house, which is unsafe for the children. The builders have just nine days to bring the property up to date and give this tired mum and dad the space they need for their active offspring. Luckily, local tradespeople and other members of the community turn out in force to help

programme.title: MasterChef USA
programme.desc: With a place in the Grand Finale on the line, the Top 4 duos must not only make one of Gordons dishes at the same speed as he makes it, but also do it while taking turns cooking

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: The Stoke crews cope with a major heart attack and a nasty football injury, while in Dudley, the paramedics help an elderly diabetic man with severe stomach pains

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The response teams rush to save the life of a 21-year-old man who has been shot twice in the chest at a pub in Doncaster. Another man has a seizure high up in the cab of his tipper truck

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A doctor on his way home from work is left fighting for his life after a head-on collision with a truck. Leeds paramedic Chris is called to a motorcyclist who has been hit by a taxi

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: A teenager prepares for the birth of her first child, and her paramedic mother struggles with the prospect of her daughter becoming a parent. Plus, a free-spirited woman who is eight days overdue arrives at the hospital, but doctors become concerned by the babys heartbeat

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: A man struggles with the knowledge that his partner is pregnant with someone elses child, but thoughts of paternity are pushed to the back of his mind when complications arise during labour. Meanwhile, an anxious husband finds it difficult to see his wife in so much pain during the birth of their first baby

programme.title: Tom Daley: Illegal to Be Me
programme.desc: The Olympic diving champion investigates homophobic behaviour around the Commonwealth, travelling to some of the countries where homosexuality is a crime and even punishable by death. Daley talks to sportspeople facing persecution and advocates fighting for change, including Michael Gunning of Jamaica, Indias Dutee Chand and swimmers Theresa Goh (of Singapore) and Amini Fonua (of Tonga)

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: West Midlands paramedics assess a man police have found acting erratically on a busy dual carriageway and believe has taken the powerful psychoactive Monkey Dust

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Jo and Mickey set up a sting at a crooked second hand store and get the shock of their lives when the villains ram raid the front door, determined to recover a camcorder. It transpires the camera contains film of gangster Craig Francess girlfriend in a compromising situation with another man, and the race is on to find the lovers before Craig does. A con-man makes a fool of Beth and Diane. Sam Kelly guest stars

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part one of two. Disgraced detective Zain Nadir is interviewed about drug trafficking in Hayes End Prison, where he is serving 10 years for perverting the course of justice, and agrees to help his colleagues infiltrate the gang involved. Jack is not sure whether he can trust his mole and fears the worst when a riot breaks out just as the police move in to arrest the operations kingpin, Zains cellmate Jason Forbes, who makes good his escape in the confusion. TJ Ramini and Lloyd McGuire guest star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part two of two. Zain gets a frosty reception at the station when Heaton secures his release from prison to help with the recapture of escaped killer Jason Forbes, and Will cant help taking a swing at the man who callously disposed of Honey Harmans body in a bid to save his own skin. The pursuit leads to a gunpoint showdown, giving Zain a clear choice between escape and doing the right thing. TJ Ramini guest stars

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Former EastEnders actress Lucy Speed joins the cast as DC Stevie Moss, who brings a breath of fresh air to CID with her positive and lively outlook - though she manages to upset Mickey on her first day by stealing his parking space. Her first case involves a professional footballer who is forced to admit he is gay after his closet lover is run over in a hit-and-run incident involving his fiancee. Suspicion falls on the players manager Ernie Rosen, who also happens to be his prospective father-in-law and anxious to avoid the shame of a scandal in the family, but Sally uncovers evidence to suggest he is covering for someone even closer to home

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A student reports being attacked in the park on her way home from the bar where she works, but a history of false allegations casts doubt on her story until the Sun Hill watch realise they have a dangerous and increasingly reckless maniac on their hands. Kezia recognises a familiar face on the list of suspects but, in the absence of evidence, Sally agrees to go undercover to catch the culprit. David Sibley guest stars

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot
